title: Lost Hallway: Where Do Lost Things Go?
description: Lost Hallway is a 38 page, full colour picture book, filled with whimsical rhymes and illustrations. It's perfect for tiny humans aged 3-7.It follows the adventures of a young boy who discovers a magical world that contains all lost things.There are rooms filled with keys. Rooms filled with pets. Rooms filled with socks and even lost bets!
author: Peter G.  Reynolds
